items.title: Full Stack Developer (Django/Python) - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer with expertise in Django and Python to join our team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, from the server-side logic to the client-side user interface. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality and scalable solutions.

Responsibilities:

Design and develop robust, secure, and scalable web applications using Django and Python.
Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to understand project requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Develop server-side logic, including database design, API integrations, and business logic implementation.
Implement efficient and reusable front-end components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following coding best practices and standards.
Ensure the performance, reliability, and security of web applications.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications, identifying and resolving issues promptly.
Collaborate with other team members, including designers and other developers, to deliver high-quality solutions.
Keep up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends, and propose innovative ideas for improvement.
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers, as needed.
Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in Django and Python.
Strong proficiency in Django framework, including Django ORM, Django templates, and authentication systems.
Experience with front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Solid understanding of web application architecture and RESTful APIs.
Proficiency in database design and SQL.
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Preferred:

Experience with other Python frameworks (e.g., Flask) and libraries.
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker).
Familiarity with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
Understanding of software testing principles and experience with testing frameworks.
Knowledge of frontend build tools (e.g., Webpack) and package managers (e.g., npm, yarn).
Join our dynamic and collaborative team, and contribute to the development of innovative web applications using Django and Python. We offer competitive compensation and a supportive work environment that encourages continuous learning and professional growth.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 17:40 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Flask, Python, Django, API, API Integration, Web Application, PostgreSQL, Amazon Web Services
Country: Bahrain
click to apply

items.title: Front End Developer - Expert Level - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We are seeking a talented Front End Developer with expertise in ReactJS to join our team. As a Front End Developer, you will be responsible for building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers, to translate design mockups and requirements into high-quality code.

Responsibilities:

Develop responsive web applications using ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborate with designers to translate UI/UX wireframes and mockups into fully functional user interfaces.
Implement client-side functionality using ReactJS components and libraries.
Optimize application performance for speed and scalability.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and provide recommendations for improvement.
Collaborate with backend developers to integrate front-end and back-end components.
Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to coding best practices and standards.
Troubleshoot and debug issues reported by users and provide timely resolutions.
Stay updated with emerging front-end technologies and industry trends.
Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience as a Front End Developer with expertise in ReactJS.
Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience with modern front-end development tools, such as webpack, Babel, and npm.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Solid understanding of responsive web design principles and cross-browser compatibility.
Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and code collaboration platforms (e.g., GitHub).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and teamwork abilities.
Preferred:

Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, MobX).
Familiarity with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Enzyme) for front-end unit testing.
Knowledge of backend technologies and frameworks (e.g., Node.js, Express) is a plus.
Join our dynamic and innovative team, and contribute to the development of cutting-edge web applications using ReactJS. We offer competitive compensation and a collaborative work environment where you can grow your skills and make a significant impact.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$40.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 17:29 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:React, Front-End Development, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, HTML, HTML5
Country: Bahrain
click to apply

items.title: üßë‚Äçüíª React.js or Vue.js Frontend Developer for Podcast web app üéß - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Hi,

I'm looking for a javascript developer who could help bring a podcast web app to production.

The project would start from 0.

The idea is a library of audio stories - similar to podcasts.
- Audio Player needed
- Library
- Payments needed
- User Registration/Login flows

The backend management is done. The backend is shared with iOS and Android native apps.

This is a high-level explanation of the project. More will be provided if I contact in person.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 16:10 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:React, Vue.js, JavaScript, Web Application
Country: Lithuania

items.title: Custom Work On BuddyBoss React Native App - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
Create custom code to exisiting BuddyBoss App in React Native via Developer GitHib.

Tasks required:
1. Wordpress Custom post type as native posts (Article)
2. Custom post type floating button to accept article and show timestamp.
3. Display Google Drive files. each user has a folder. Current logged in user should see files from their folder.
4. Updated login screen using Digits Plugin OTP SMS login.
5. Tasks page admin can create tasks and users can mark tasks as complete.

All the above features are already in my WordPress site just need to make them native in BuddyBoss App.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 15:12 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:React Native, JavaScript, Android, iOS, Mobile App Development, Android App Development, PHP, React, Firebase, Smartphone
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

items.title: Need a MERN Stack Developer - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We are looking for an experienced MERN Stack Developer with good experience in React.JS, Node.JS, MongoDB or any other NoSQL DB. Should have strong knowledge of the MERN technology stack and be able to manage the deployment process.

This position requires excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. Must be knowledgeable in front-end and back-end technologies, with proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and database management. Familiarity with Git and version control is also required.

Info for the typical roles,
Key skills: ReactJS, MongoDB, APIs, Node, Laravel,MySQL, npm, Webpack, HTML5, CSS3, Agile, MERN

Job Summary: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated MERN Stack Developer to join our dynamic development team. As a MERN Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js) stack. Your expertise in front-end and back-end technologies, coupled with your ability to work collaboratively in an Agile development environment, will be essential to the success of our projects. This is a Remote position
Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and deploy high-quality web applications using the MERN stack.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and define project requirements.
Develop and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.
Participate in code reviews to ensure the adherence to best practices and coding standards.
Troubleshoot and debug issues, providing timely resolutions to ensure smooth application functionality.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Conduct thorough testing and documentation of developed features.
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in web development and propose innovative solutions.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
Work closely with project managers to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality solutions.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 14:47 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

items.title: Musical streaming app developer - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Music Streaming App Developer to work as an individual developer. This is an opportunity for you to utilize your expertise in both app and back-end development to create a music streaming application.

Responsibilities:

Design and develop a robust and user-friendly music streaming application for web and/or mobile platforms.
Handle both app and back-end development tasks, including implementing audio playback features, integrating APIs for music catalog and metadata, and managing user data and preferences.
Implement secure user authentication, authorization, and data protection measures.
Optimize app performance, responsiveness, and reliability for different devices and network conditions.
Collaborate with stakeholders (if applicable) to gather requirements and align the app's functionality and user experience with their expectations.
Troubleshoot and debug issues, perform maintenance tasks, and address user feedback.
Stay updated with emerging technologies, trends, and best practices in music streaming and mobile/web development.
Manage the entire development lifecycle, from initial planning and design to deployment and ongoing maintenance.
Required Skills/Experience:

Proficiency in mobile and/or web application development using technologies such as Swift, Kotlin, Java, React Native, or Flutter.
Strong understanding of audio streaming protocols, codecs, and related technologies (e.g., HLS, MPEG-DASH, WebRTC).
Experience with back-end development using languages such as Node.js, Python, or Ruby, and frameworks like Express, Django
Familiarity with database systems, both SQL and NoSQL, for managing user data, playlists, and preferences.
Ability to work independently, take ownership of the development process, and drive the project forward.


We look forward to receiving your application and discussing how your skills and expertise can contribute to the successful development of a music streaming application. Please provide any relevant examples or portfolio of previous projects you have worked on.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 12:20 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Android, Smartphone, Mobile App Development, Tablet, Android App Development, iOS Development, iOS, User Authentication, JavaScript, Streaming Music Promotion
Country: United States

items.title: React  Developer Needed for Hydration/SSR Setup in Existing React Project - Upwork
items.content:encoded:
We're looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to assist with setting up Hydration/Server-Side Rendering (SSR) in our current project.

The project functions as a Single Page Application (SPA) setup. It was created with create-react-app and uses TypeScript (TSX). It has been updated to the latest version of React and employs MobX for state management. The project features multiple languages and real-time data updates handled via WebSockets. We use Craco to modify the default webpack configuration.

The main task is to setup Server-Side Rendering (SSR) using a Hydration approach. This should be performed on an Express server for pre-rendering. You will also be required to implement pre-warming for some of the routes.

Responsibilities:
* Setup Hydration/SSR on our existing React project
* Implement pre-rendering on an Express server
* Setup route pre-warming
* Collaborate with our existing team to understand and achieve project goals

Requirements:
* Proficiency in React, TypeScript (TSX), and MobX
* Extensive experience with server-side rendering (SSR) and Hydration in React
* Familiarity with Craco and modifying webpack configurations
* Experience with Express server for pre-rendering
* Knowledge of WebSocket technology for real-time data updates
* Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
* Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Please include the answer to the following question at the beginning of your cover letter to confirm you've read and understand the job requirements: "Who is the king of the jungle?"

Only those candidates who answer the question and meet the required qualifications will be considered. This is an excellent opportunity to join a dynamic team and work on a project utilizing leading-edge technology.

Ensure that you have a trackable history of experience with the relevant technologies.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 17, 2023 11:47 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:Sass, React, Redux, TypeScript, Node.js, JavaScript
Country: Turkey
click to apply
